summary: After his work partner is murdered, a gung-ho insurance claims investigator teams with a new female investigator to uncover a massive, homicidal fraud the company seems to be perpetrating on its biggest clients.

Farley|Orson Bean|Chyna|Kevin Pollak|Tracy Morgan|Andy Richter|Josh Jacobson|Valarie Ianniello|Iva Hasperger|Ramona Oprea|Adam Gregor|Adam Carolla|George Lopez|Molly Sims|A.J. Lee Ermey|Chad Everett|Isaac Hanson|Frank Hudetz|Mike Kirkland|Eric Lichtenberg|Eric Moyer|Paul Oliver|Kristina Simonds
keywords: gay bar|neo screwball comedy|insurance claim|investigator|slapstick comedy
title: Los casos de Frank McKlusky
